languages.text: Суровый дом Зауэрбэков нашел защиту под крылом церкви святого Друза. Пожертвовав все средства нуждающимся, они стали суровыми и яростными ревнителями веры, ведущими вооруженные толпы черни на битву со злом.

The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.
languages.original_text: Суровый дом Зауэрбэков нашел защиту под крылом церкви святого Друза. Пожертвовав все средства нуждающимся, они стали суровыми и яростными ревнителями веры, ведущими вооруженные толпы черни на битву со злом.

traits.locale_text: The stern House Sauerback found protection under the wing of Saint Drusus Church. After they gave up all of their finances toward those in need, they became harsh and fierce champions of faith, leading crowds of rabble to fight evil.

The stern House Sauerback found protection under the wing of Saint Drusus Church. After they gave up all of their finances toward those in need, they became harsh and fierce champions of faith, leading crowds of rabble to fight evil.

Austere House Sauerback found protection with the Church of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

Austere House Sauerback found protection with the Church of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

languages.text: 生活俭朴的苏尔贝克家族在圣德鲁苏斯教会寻得了庇护。他们将自己的财富捐赠给那些需要帮助的人，成为了冷酷而无畏的信仰斗士，积极带领信众与邪恶抗争。
languages.original_text: The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

traits.locale_text: 生活俭朴的苏尔贝克家族在圣德鲁苏斯教会寻得了庇护。他们将自己的财富捐赠给那些需要帮助的人，成为了冷酷而无畏的信仰斗士，积极带领信众与邪恶抗争。

languages.text: Das strenge Haus Sauerback fand Schutz im Kult des Heiligen Drusus. Das Haus spendete seine Reichtümer für die Bedürftigen und wurde zu fanatischen, entschlossenen Streitern des Glaubens. Sie führten den Pöbel im Kampf gegen das Böse an.
languages.original_text: The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

traits.locale_text: Das strenge Haus Sauerback fand Schutz in der Kirche des Heiligen Drusus. Das Haus spendete seine Reichtümer für die Bedürftigen und wurde zu fanatischen, entschlossenen Streitern des Glaubens. Sie führten den Pöbel im Kampf gegen das Böse an.

languages.text: L'austère maison Sauerback se plaça sous la protection du Culte de Saint Drusus. Faisant don de ses richesses aux nécessiteux, elle devint un sinistre et féroce défenseur de la foi guidant le peuple dans le combat contre le mal.
languages.original_text: The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

traits.locale_text: L'austère maison Sauerback se plaça sous la protection de l’Église de Saint Drusus. Faisant don de ses richesses aux nécessiteux, elle devint un sinistre et féroce défenseur de la foi guidant le peuple dans le combat contre le mal.

languages.text: La austera casa Sauerback encontró la protección en el Culto de San Drusus. Sus miembros donaron toda su fortuna a los necesitados y se convirtieron en fervientes campeones de la fe para liderar al populacho en la lucha contra el mal.
languages.original_text: The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

traits.locale_text: La austera casa Sauerback encontró la protección en la Iglesia de San Drusus. Sus miembros donaron toda su fortuna a los necesitados y se convirtieron en fervientes campeones de la fe para liderar al populacho en la lucha contra el mal.

languages.text: 質素倹約を旨とするザウアーバック家は聖ドルスス教団の庇護を得た。必要な者に富を施すことで、一家は厳格で熱烈な信仰の闘士となり、悪との戦いに庶民を導いていった。
languages.original_text: The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

traits.locale_text: 質素倹約を旨とするザウアーバック家は聖ドルスス教団の庇護を得た。必要な者に富を施すことで、一家は厳格で熱烈な信仰の闘士となり、悪との戦いに庶民を導いていった。

languages.text: Çetin Sauerback Hanesi, Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'na sığındı. Zenginliklerini ihtiyaç sahiplerine bağışladılar, gaddar ve azılı birer inanç müdafisine dönüştüler, ayaktakımına önderlik edip kötülüğe karşı savaştılar.
languages.original_text: The austere House Sauerback found protection in the Cult of Saint Drusus. Donating their riches to those in need, they became grim and fierce champions of faith, leading the rabble in the fight against evil.

traits.locale_text: Çetin Sauerback Hanesi, Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'na sığındı. Zenginliklerini ihtiyaç sahiplerine bağışladılar, gaddar ve azılı birer inanç müdafisine dönüştüler, ayaktakımına önderlik edip kötülüğe karşı savaştılar.
